properties.areaDesc: Straits of Florida from west end of Seven Mile Bridge to south of Halfmoon Shoal out 20 NM; Straits of Florida from Halfmoon Shoal to 20 NM west of Dry Tortugas out 20 NM; Straits of Florida from west end of Seven Mile Bridge to south of Halfmoon Shoal 20 to 60 NM out; Straits of Florida from Halfmoon Shoal to 20 NM west of Dry Tortugas 20 to 60 NM out; Hawk Channel from west end of Seven Mile Bridge to Halfmoon Shoal out to the reef
properties.headline: Special Marine Warning issued February 1 at 11:51AM EST until February 1 at 12:30PM EST by NWS Key West FL
properties.description:
For the following areas...
Hawk Channel and Straits of Florida from west end of Seven Mile
Bridge to 20 nm west of Dry Tortugas out 60 nm...

At 1151 AM EST, strong thunderstorms were located along a line
extending from 6 nm south of Cosgrove Shoal Light to 52 nm south of
Tortugas Ecological Reserve South, moving east at 30 knots.

HAZARD...Wind gusts 34 knots or greater.

SOURCE...National Weather Service Meteorologist.

IMPACT...Expect wind gusts in excess of 34 knots, suddenly higher
waves, frequent lightning, and heavy downpours.

Locations in the warning include...
Western Dry Rocks, Sand Key Light and Eastern Dry Rocks.
properties.instruction:
Prepare for severe thunderstorms with wind gusts in excess of 50
knots, extremely rough seas, frequent lightning, and torrential
downpours. Be advised that any severe thunderstorm can spawn a
waterspout or tornado. Stay low or go below, and make sure all on
board are wearing life jackets.

NWSheadline: A SPECIAL MARINE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1230 PM EST
